title: Bug 134488Set page break for table inside list group header will cause data display error.
OB: Bug 134488Set page break for table inside list group header will cause data display error.
EB: See attached report.Expected result:Data display correctlyActual result:In Web Viewer, data in table kept display the first data row in each page.In html/pdf, it's ok.
SR: Description:Set page break for table inside list group header will cause data display error.Steps to reproduce:1. Insert a list with a group2. Insert a table to list group header3. Set pagebreakbefore to always to table.4. Preview in web viewer/html/pdf.
